articles.title: Alejandro Garnacho, the 17-year-old Man Utd wonderkid walking alongside Messi and Ronaldo
articles.description: Garnacho has been called into Argentina's World Cup squad without even making his United first-team debut, and Javier Mascherano is a fan of the talented winger
articles.content:
Alejandro Garnacho is the Manchester United wonderkid who has the chance to play alongside Lionel Messi before Cristiano Ronaldo - and it’s all down to former Liverpool midfielder Javier Mascherano.

articles.title: EMERGING MARKETS-EM equities skid 1% on China slump, Moscow shares retreat
articles.description: South Africa's rand held at a five-month high against the dollar and was on pace for a weekly gain of 2.8% after the central bank raised the repo rate. Elsewhere, the International Monetary Fund on Friday will decide on Argentina's $45 billion program, with the country anticipated to clear the final hurdle to rework its debt, sources said.
articles.content:
Emerging market shares fell 1% on Friday as a selloff in Chinese stocks dragged down Asian equities, while worries over the Ukraine war's economic impact and signs of tightening monetary policy globally also weighed on sentiment.

articles.title: When was the Falklands War and how long did it last?
articles.description: The Falklands War was a ten-week undeclared war between Argentina and the United Kingdom
articles.content:
The Falklands War took place from April 2, 1982 to June 14 of the same year. 2022 marks the fortieth anniversary of the conflict.
It was a ten-week undeclared war between Argentina and the United Kingdom, fought over two territories in the South Atla... [6157 chars]
